sentence.Network_en: He believes in atheism as though it were a new religion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他信奉无神论就像信仰一种新的宗教。

sentence.Network_en: Chinese citizens enjoy the freedom to believe in religion and the freedom not to believe in it and to propagate atheism.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国公民有信仰宗教的自由和不信仰宗教、宣传无神论的自由.

sentence.Network_en: Atheism is the opinion that there is no God.
sentence.Network_cn: 无神论是认为不存在上帝的看法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 无字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 无上〖 thehighest;supreme;paramount〗 无神论〖 atheism〗 无声〖 silent;noiseless〗.
He converted her from Christianity to atheism ., 他使她由一个基督徒转变成一个无神论者.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... asymmetric adj. 不对称的 atheism n. 无神论,不信神 athletics n. 运动,体育.
其实无宗教信仰 (no religion) 和无神主义 (Atheism) 绝不相同。例如孔子，信天 (天上有主宰)，所以他是无宗教信仰，不是无神主义者。

list.abs: to publicize marxist atheism and put it into practice ., 要把马克思主义无神论的宣传落到实处.

by analyzing the causes of the formation of college students' religious concept , the following countermeasures and suggestions are put forwardto strengthen the education of scientific atheism ;通过分析大学生宗教观形成的原因，提出了以下几方面的对策和建议：加强科学无神论教育；
science and atheism education in primary and middle schools ., 中小学校中的科学与无神论教育.

and yet my guess is that the atheism debate is going to be a sideshow . the cognitive revolution is not going to end up undermining faith in God , it ’ s going to end up challenging faith in the Bible .我推测关于无神论的争论将会是一个枝节问题，认知革命是不会以削弱信仰上帝而收场，相反它会以质疑圣经中的信条而

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French athéisme, from Greek atheos, from a- 'without' + theos 'god'

entry.def: Atheism is the belief that there is no God.

means.word_mean: 1. the doctrine or belief that there is no God
2. a lack of belief in the existence of God or gods

auth_sentence.content: Humanism is a religion; atheism is a religion.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Humanism is a religion; atheism is a religion.

auth_sentence.content: But actually atheism seems to be on the rise.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But actually atheism seems to be on the rise.

auth_sentence.content: As for Pantheism, it is Atheism in domino.
auth_sentence.res_content: As for Pantheism, it is Atheism in domino.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: As for Pantheism, it is Atheism in domino.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a不+theism[n.一神论,有神论]→n.无神论,不信神
the神+ism学术流派等→n.一神论,有神论

sentences.en: Chinese citizens enjoy the freedom to believe in religion and the freedom not to believe in it and to propagate atheism.
sentences.cn: 中国公民有信仰宗教的自由和不信仰宗教、宣传无神论的自由。
